content: i had the great pleasure of designing the 12 main october square for bamcal 2024 it s named after the goddess of abundance fruit trees gardens and orchards in ancient roman religion and myth the name pomona comes from the latin word *pomum* which means orchard fruit written pattern with step-by-step photos skill level intermediate stitches used single_crochet fpsc half_double_crochet fp/bphdc double_crochet fpdc treble_crochet fptr popcorn the pattern calls for aran weight yarn but you can use any yarn with a suitable hook please note that this will affect the size of your square
